body_html:
@vrv
Sorry guys, I have been stupidly busy! I am still not sure how the testing framwork works.

Do I just add a function to the estimator_test.py file?

Also, do you think hard-coded filtering the global_step key inside _write_dict_to_summary is good enough?

body:
@vrv 
Sorry guys, I have been stupidly busy! I am still not sure how the testing framwork works.

Do I just add a function to the [estimator_test.py](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/estimator_test.py) file?

Also, do you think hard-coded filtering the `global_step` key inside [_write_dict_to_summary](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/1a1527ab1fcffd94f692b1301fdbe87903ce7bdb/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/estimator.py#L331) is good enough?
